Imagine the world's lowest-friction thought-capture system meets Figma-for-knowledge-graphs. Imagine Obsidian, but maintained by AI and massively collaborative. Backed by $10M+ from Naval, Palantir co-founder, First Round Capital, and featured in ProductHunt Weekly Highlight. We're ideaflow.io!
